channel.title: Agile on vNinja.net
channel.description: Recent content in Agile on vNinja.net

item.title: A great disturbance in the Force
item.description: So, the cat formerly known as vSphere.next is finally out of it’s rather big bag, and vSphere 6.0 has been officially announced and will be available some time in Q1 (no date has been announced yet). There is enough of posts going into details on what is new and what has been announced, so I won’t be going over that right now. If you want to hear me talk about vSphere 6.0 and related news, you can always attend VMUG Norway on the 19th of february.
